description: Retrieves details about an application component.

parameters.name: applicationComponentId
parameters.description: The ID of the application component. The ID is unique within an AWS account.

nested_items.name: applicationComponentDetail
nested_items.description: Detailed information about an application component.

nested_items.name: analysisStatus
nested_items.description: The status of analysis, if the application component has source code or an associated database.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportS3Object
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name and the Amazon S3 key name for the anti-pattern report.

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: s3key
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the anti-pattern report generation.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the anti-pattern.

nested_items.name: appType
nested_items.description: The type of application component.

nested_items.name: appUnitError
nested_items.description: The error in the analysis of the source code or database.

nested_items.name: appUnitErrorCategory
nested_items.description: The category of the error.

nested_items.name: associatedServerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the server that the application component is running on.

nested_items.name: databaseConfigDetail
nested_items.description: Configuration details for the database associated with the application component.

nested_items.name: secretName
nested_items.description: AWS Secrets Manager key that holds the credentials that you use to connect to a database.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the application component.

nested_items.name: inclusionStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the application component has been included for server recommendation or not.

nested_items.name: lastAnalyzedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the application component was assessed.

nested_items.name: listAntipatternSeveritySummary
nested_items.description: A list of anti-pattern severity summaries.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: Contains the count of anti-patterns.

nested_items.name: severity
nested_items.description: Contains the severity of anti-patterns.

nested_items.name: moreServerAssociationExists
nested_items.description: Set to true if the application component is running on multiple servers.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of application component.

nested_items.name: osDriver
nested_items.description: OS driver.

nested_items.name: osVersion
nested_items.description: OS version.

nested_items.name: recommendationSet
nested_items.description: The top recommendation set for the application component.

nested_items.name: strategy
nested_items.description: The recommended strategy.

nested_items.name: targetDestination
nested_items.description: The recommended target destination.

nested_items.name: transformationTool
nested_items.description: The target destination for the recommendation set.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Description of the tool.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the tool.

nested_items.name: tranformationToolInstallationLink
nested_items.description: URL for installing the tool.

nested_items.name: resourceSubType
nested_items.description: The application component subtype.

nested_items.name: resultList
nested_items.description: A list of the analysis results.

nested_items.name: analysisStatus
nested_items.description: The error in server analysis.

nested_items.name: runtimeAnalysisStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the analysis.

nested_items.name: srcCodeOrDbAnalysisStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the source code or database analysis.

nested_items.name: analysisType
nested_items.description: The error in server analysis.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportResultList
nested_items.description: The error in server analysis.

nested_items.name: analyzerName
nested_items.description: The analyzer name.

nested_items.name: binaryAnalyzerName
nested_items.description: The binary analyzer names.

nested_items.name: runTimeAnalyzerName
nested_items.description: The assessment analyzer names.

nested_items.name: sourceCodeAnalyzerName
nested_items.description: The source code analyzer names.

nested_items.name: antiPatternReportS3Object
nested_items.description: Contains the S3 bucket name and the Amazon S3 key name.

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: s3key
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the anti-pattern report generation.

nested_items.name: antipatternReportStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the anti-pattern.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The error in server analysis.

nested_items.name: runtimeStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the application unit.

nested_items.name: runtimeStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the application unit.

nested_items.name: sourceCodeRepositories
nested_items.description: Details about the source code repository associated with the application component.

nested_items.name: branch
nested_items.description: The branch of the source code.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project.

nested_items.name: repository
nested_items.description: The repository name for the source code.

nested_items.name: versionControlType
nested_items.description: The type of repository to use for the source code.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed description of the analysis status and any failure message.

nested_items.name: associatedApplications
nested_items.description: The associated application group as defined in AWS Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: ID of the application as defined in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name of the application as defined in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: associatedServerIds
nested_items.description: A list of the IDs of the servers on which the application component is running.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: moreApplicationResource
nested_items.description: Set to true if the application component belongs to more than one application group.
